title: A Wizard Alone
description: While Nita grieves over her mother's death, Kit tackles a challenge as dangerous as it is Rescue a young wizard who has vanished on his first assignment. This new wizard is unlike any other--he's autistic and he's a magical prodigy. His power is enormous. Now Kit and his dog, Ponch, must track down the missing boy before the Lone Power finds him.
author: Diane Duane
